mapper.select: SELECT FROM erp_bulk_material ebm WHERE ebm.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND data_status = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into erp_bulk_material (bulk_material_no,bulk_material_type,is_main_material,bulk_material_name,material_id,material_no,current_warehouse_id,current_warehouse_position_id,owner_warehouse_id,owner_warehouse_position_id,brand_id,material_model_id,material_capacity_value,bulk_material_price,current_equipment_id,current_equipment_no,bulk_material_status,data_status,remark,create_time,create_user,update_time,update_user)
SELECT #{bulkMaterialDO.bulkMaterialNo},em.material_type, em.is_main_material, em.material_name ,#{bulkMaterialDO.materialId},em.material_no,#{bulkMaterialDO.currentWarehouseId},#{bulkMaterialDO.currentWarehousePositionId},#{bulkMaterialDO.ownerWarehouseId},#{bulkMaterialDO.ownerWarehousePositionId}, em.brand_id,em.material_model_id,em.material_capacity_value,em.material_price,equipment_info.current_equipment_id ,#{bulkMaterialDO.currentEquipmentNo}, #{bulkMaterialDO.bulkMaterialStatus},#{bulkMaterialDO.dataStatus},#{bulkMaterialDO.remark}, #{bulkMaterialDO.createTime},#{bulkMaterialDO.createUser},#{bulkMaterialDO.updateTime},#{bulkMaterialDO.updateUser} FROM erp_material em LEFT JOIN (select epe.id as current_equipment_id from erp_product_equipment epe where epe.equipment_no = #{bulkMaterialDO.currentEquipmentNo}) equipment_info on 1=1 WHERE em.id = #{bulkMaterialDO.materialId}
